data.name: Mechanical Keyboard
data.description: Premium hot-swappable mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting, PBT keycaps, and a solid aluminum frame. Gateron switches included.

data.name: Wireless Mouse
data.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with 16000 DPI optical sensor, USB-C charging, and up to 70 hours of battery life.

data.name: USB-C Hub
data.description: 7-in-1 USB-C hub with 4K HDMI, 100W pass-through charging, SD card reader, and three USB-A 3.0 ports.

data.name: Laptop Stand
data.description: Adjustable aluminum laptop stand with ventilation cutouts. Supports laptops from 10 to 17 inches. Cable management built in.

data.name: Desk Mat
data.description: Extended desk mat (900x400mm) with stitched edges and non-slip rubber base. Water-resistant microfiber surface.

data.name: Cable Management Kit
data.description: Complete cable management solution with under-desk tray, adhesive clips, velcro ties, and cable sleeves for a clean setup.

data.name: Monitor Light Bar
data.description: Asymmetric LED monitor light bar with adjustable color temperature (2700K-6500K) and brightness. No screen glare design.

data.name: IDE License Pro
data.description: Annual license for IDE Pro with AI code completion, advanced refactoring tools, and integrated debugging across all major languages.
